name: WARP!
description:
Oh no, your ship's thruster has broken down.
Luckily your chief engineer finished work on the experimental warp drive.
Why move your ship when you can move the universe around it instead ?

Controls:
* left/right arrow to rotate your ship
* 1 to pull the universe towards you
* 2 to push everything away from you (look for the required ship upgrade)
* 3 to push things in front of you away (look for the required ship upgrade)
* space bar to shoot (look for the required ship upgrade)
* left-shift reverses the direction of force applied by your new drive (this can also act as a brake, when combined with 1)

Licenses

* Font: http://www.fontspace.com/pixel-sagas/hyperspace
* Title music: Rise of Space from http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Starscream/Future_and_It_Doesnt_Work/8bp099-01... (Attribution-Noncommercial-No Derivative Works 3.0 United States License.)
* Background music: Starbox from http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Starbox/  (Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike License)
* Game over music: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Visager/Songs_From_An_Unmade_World_2/Visager_-_Songs_From_An_Unmade_World_2_-_31_Final_Sacrifice_-Loop- (Attribution 4.0 International )
* Other sound effects created with Audacity (https://www.audacityteam.org/)
